title: Naan Oru Sindhu Song Lyrics Sindhu Bhairavi
stanzas: <div>Naan Oru Sindhu Song Lyrics Sindhu Bhairavi

[Naan oru sindhu
kaavadi sindhu
raagam puryavilla
ulla sogam theriyavila

thandhai irundhum
thaaiyum irundhum
sondham yedhuvumilla
adha solla theriyavilla] (2)

Naan oru sindhu
kaavadi sindhu
raagam puryavilla
ulla sogam theriyavila

Illaadha uravukku
ennenna pero
naadodi paattukku
thaai thandhai yaaro(2)

vidhiyodu naan aadum
vilaiyaatu paaru
vilaiyaadha kaatuku
vidhai potathaaru

Naan oru sindhu
kaavadi sindhu
raagam puryavilla
ulla sogam theriyavila

Pen kandru pasu thedi
paarkindra velai
ammanu sollavum
adhigaaram illai (2)

Naan oru sindhu
kaavadi sindhu
raagam puryavilla
ulla sogam theriyavila

thandhai irundhum
thaaiyum irundhum
sondham yedhuvumilla
adha solla theriyavilla
